metadata.title: CVE-2018-11226 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The getString function in decompile.c in libming through 0.4.8 mishandlescases where the header indicates a file size greater than the actual size,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Segmentationfault and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
